content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. I am sure you will find my apartment in the city center quite appealing. Now, about the rental price, I am looking for a minimum of 2000 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a bit expensive for me. I am willing to pay 1500 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I disagree, 1500 euros is too low for my apartment. I am looking for a minimum of 1800 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but I'm willing to pay 1600 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your counteroffer, but 1600 euros is still too low. I am looking for a minimum of 1800 euros per month. It is a great apartment, and I believe it is worth the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I can meet you halfway. I'm willing to pay 1700 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I respect your willingness to meet halfway, but 1700 euros is still too low for my apartment. I am looking for a minimum of 1800 euros per month. I am sure you understand that I must receive a fair price for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. I'm willing to pay 1750 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, but 1750 euros is still too low. I am looking for a minimum of 1800 euros per month. I am sure you can appreciate the value of my apartment, and I believe it is worth the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1800] Euro!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1800] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
